column5: Due to personal budget I have to sell my boat. Can any members show me where I can fish in some marina near Lindsey, peterborugh or Rice lake area, I know I need to pay to using marina area but better than keep a boat due to tight tight budget.  Please email me at [emailÂ protected]  Thanks in advance!
There's a public dock in Gore's Landing (Rice Lake).  It's just beside Plank Road Marina, if I remember correctly.
Lots of fun to be had under/near the bridges right in Lindsay ... public parks ... no charge ... Plenty of Walleye, Musky and Bass (when in season)... bring a lawnchair and pretend you are trolling
Buy a Backroads Mapbook of your area. They sell them at Crappy tire. Go exploring, I'm sure you'll find lots of places to shorefish.
Those backroad mapbooks are great, I picked mine up at MEC but have also seen them at CT.  Lots of smaller lakes and suggested access.  Mike
